'May I obtain the foremost celestial palace, with the Honored Buddha dwelling and transforming in it, may all beings who enter become Buddhas.'
You, in front of the Well-Gone One after bathing, truly made this sincere vow:
'If in the hot summer days, may beings be free from mental and physical distress.'
You, in the presence of Buddha Angiara, also made this superior vow:
'Always in the long night of darkness, may I offer lamps and light to dispel confusion.'
If I give away my body and life, all the sentient beings who eat my flesh,
Will surely attain Buddhahood without doubt, not those who attain realization in their present bodies.
If any sentient beings hear my name, whether in the state of awakening or in dreams,
All will attain Buddhahood without doubt, not those who attain realization in their present bodies.
When you are diligently and vigorously practicing, all the love and hatred you create,
These will all become Dharma Kings, not those who attain realization in their present bodies.
In all the places you have been born in immeasurable past lives, you have always aspired to seek enlightenment,
I now tell you your true merits, and in the future you will surely attain the unsurpassed honor.
If there are any birds, beasts, or other beings, they will surely attain Buddhahood without doubt,
All those who eat your flesh and so forth will naturally realize the Dharma body.
I know you have a thousand practices, all for the benefit of sentient beings,
If there are any who hear and give rise to doubt, I do not speak because the time has not yet come.
All the matters I have spoken of, if there are sentient beings who wish to hear,
They will attain Buddhahood without doubt, not by other present body-realizers.
If a person wishes to see the World-Honored Savior, turning this pure and supreme Dharma wheel;
Having heard, they are able to destroy all suffering and distress, and delight in hearing for the sake of realizing enlightenment.
If a person wishes to see the Buddhas of the three times, respectfully making offerings to the supreme field of blessings,
